input: @Magadhi boys tumne patient ki to baat sun li......Kabhi ek din dr. Ke saath reh kar gujaaro magadhi boys tabb tumko samaj me aayega ki patient ka attendant kaise behave karta hain dr. Ke saath....Orr hospital me kitne kam sansadhno ke saath kaam karna padta hain.....Uppar se in marizon ke aadmi ko kuch bhi bolo test karwaane ke liye to ye test ke naam par bas ek ultrasound karwa lenge....Bas isi se inki jaanch ho jaati hai. Puri ki maine saare test karwa liya hain....Jab delivery ka time aayega to bas inke pass ek ultrasound report hoga wo bhi 3 ya 4 months purana......Koi blood test nahi rahega inka NAA to HIV, HEPATITIS,BLOOD GROUP,VDRL, HEMOGLOBIN....Orr raat me rajgir me suvidha bhi nahi hain jaanch ke liye.......Jo lab technician the sab ke sab corona me lage hue hain....To tum hi batao @magadhi boys ki aise me raat me akela dr.
